notice of a proposal to transfer land means notice given under paragraph 48(2),
Register has the meaning given by paragraph 44(1),
seller has the meaning given by paragraph 53(2)(a).

intro.p: The following enactments are disapplied in relation to small landholdings—
in the Crofters Holdings (Scotland) Act 1886—

content.p: section 5 (rent altered by agreement),
section 6 (fixed rent),
section 7 (renunciation of tenancy),
section 8 (compensation to small landholder for improvements on removal),
section 10 (principle of valuation),
section 16 (bequest of holding),
section 20 (procedure in fixing fair rent),
the schedule (permanent improvements),
the Crofters Holdings (Scotland) Act 1887,

intro.p: in the Small Landholders (Scotland) Act 1911—

content.p: section 7(6) (rent for new small landholders),
section 7(7) (loans to new small landholders),
section 8 (provisions regulating loans to landholders),
section 9 (loans for buildings),
section 13 (present rent),
section 21 (assignment of holding),
section 23 (arrears of rent to be set off against compensation for improvements),

intro.p: in the Small Landholders and Agricultural Holdings (Scotland) Act 1931—

content.p: section 1 (compensation to an outgoing holder),
section 5 (provisions as to loans for buildings),
section 10 (record of holding),
section 11 (assessment of compensation for improvements prior to renunciation),
section 12 (amendment of 1886 Act in relation to compensation),
section 22 (renunciation of tenancies).
The Small Landholders (Scotland) Act 1911 is modified as follows.

In section 10(1) (additional statutory conditions), after “cultivation of the holding” insert “, and without prejudice also to the ability to make use of the land for a diverse purpose under Part 2 of the schedule of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025”.

In section 26(3)(a) (supplementary provisions), for “present rent of which within the meaning of this Act” substitute “rent of which, in accordance with Part 1 of the schedule of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025,”.

hcontainer.heading: The Small Landholders and Agricultural Holdings (Scotland) Act 1931

content.p: The Small Landholders and Agricultural Holdings (Scotland) Act 1931 is modified as follows.
In section 1(2) (compensation to an outgoing holder), for “aforesaid” substitute “is provided for in paragraph 34 of the schedule of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025,”.
In section 3 (removal of landholder), the words from “and where a landholder” to the end are repealed.
The Succession (Scotland) Act 1964 is modified as follows.

intro.p: In section 16 (provisions relating to leases)—

content.p: in subsection (2)(c), for “section 16 of the Act of 1886” substitute “paragraph 23 or 24 of the schedule of the 2025 Act”,
in subsection (2A), after “1991 Act tenancy” insert “or small landholding”,

intro.p: in subsection (3)—
in paragraph (b)(i)—

content.p: for the words from “a petition” to “that court,” substitute “an application or appeal to the Land Court under section 12A or 12B of the 1991 Act or paragraph 23 or 24 of the schedule of the 2025 Act,”,
the words “the petition,” are repealed,
in the closing words, for “the next following subsection” substitute “subsection (4)”,
in subsection (4), for “last foregoing subsection” substitute “subsection (3)”,

intro.p: in subsection (8)—

content.p: the words “paragraphs (a) to (h) of section 16 of the Act of 1886,” are repealed,
after “2003 Act,” insert “paragraphs 22(1), 23 and 24 of the schedule of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025,”,
in subsection (8A)(a), after “tenancy” insert “or small landholding”,

intro.p: in subsection (9)—

content.p: the definition of “the Act of 1886” is repealed,

p.mod:
after the definition of “the 2003 Act” insert—
the 2025 Act means the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025,
,

after the definition of “lease” insert—
small landholding is to be construed in accordance with paragraph 66 of the schedule of the 2025 Act,
.

intro.p: In section 29 (right of tenant to bequeath interest under lease), in subsection (2)—

content.p: the words “section 16 of the Crofters Holdings (Scotland) Act 1886 or” are repealed,
after “(asp 11)” insert “or paragraph 23 or 24 of the schedule of the Land Reform (Scotland) Act 2025”.

hcontainer.name: crossheading
hcontainer.heading: Restriction on contracting out of statutory provision relating to small landholdings

content.p: Section 25 of the Small Landholders and Agricultural Holdings (Scotland) Act 1931 (voiding of agreement inconsistent with the Landholders Acts) applies to this schedule as it applies to the Landholders Acts.

intro.p: In this schedule—

content.p: Land Court means the Scottish Land Court,
Landholders Acts means the Small Landholders (Scotland) Acts 1886 to 1931,
Lands Tribunal means the Lands Tribunal for Scotland,
small landholder means a person who is a small landholder for the purposes of the Landholders Acts, and small landholding is to be construed accordingly.
